QuestData.Title: Not Quite Shipshape
QuestData.Description: Evacuation, you say? Well, we had that very same idea all on our own after these Forsaken started showing up.$B$BWe were thinking the water would be the safest way out of here.$B$BUnfortunately our boats didn't come out from that last earthquake unscathed.$B$BI need some additional supplies to finish my repairs: wood, tar and my tools. Get them for me so that my brothers and I can make it out of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Planks of Wood, Coal Tar and Shipwright's Tools.
QuestData.RewardText: This is great, $n. I should be able to finish the repairs in no time.
